shallowsalts.pea_puffer.name: Pea Puffer
shallowsalts.pea_puffer.desc: A small curious fish with the attitude of a puppy and the hunger of a baby.
shallowsalts.horned_snail.name: Horned Snail
shallowsalts.horned_snail.desc: According to the Lady of the Manor, this spiky little snail is a delicacy to some people, I dont understand how people can eat these slimy things.
shallowsalts.buttered_comet.name: Buttered Comet
shallowsalts.buttered_comet.desc: This basically cooked snail has the speed and energy of a shooting star, I am not kidding when i say these little rockets need to be tied down if you dont want them blasting a hole through the hull of your ship.
shallowsalts.sun_striker.name: Sun Striker
shallowsalts.sun_striker.desc: A ball of visira and light, horrific beauty has burst from this small creature leaving it immobile to float through the ocean like a jewel.
shallowsalts.discus.name: Discus
shallowsalts.discus.desc: A technicolor dinner plate, a large schooling fish that is never alone, if you find one you have found six.
shallowsalts.sanguine_mirror.name: Sanguine Mirror
shallowsalts.sanguine_mirror.desc: A radient peek into an otherworldly realm, take head of this creatures warning for darkness is coming.
shallowsalts.pirarucu.name: Pirarucu
shallowsalts.pirarucu.desc: A large beast of the rivers, it stalk its prey in the cover of the murky water.
shallowsalts.seething_stalker.name: Seething Stalker
shallowsalts.seething_stalker.desc: A nightmare birthed of blasted rock and hellish blood, a thrashing beast known for tearing and eviserating anything that gets too close.
shallowsalts.flowerhorn.name: flowerhorn
shallowsalts.flowerhorn.desc: A fish of elegant rage, always fighting for territory, wanting to be the heart of its small peice of the ocean.
shallowsalts.burning_bloom.name: Burning Bloom
shallowsalts.burning_bloom.desc: The rage that burns within this fish carves a line between the deep and the sky, fighting not only for its territory but also for the fish untouched by aberration.
shallowsalts.black_diamond_stingray.name: Black Diamond Stingray
shallowsalts.black_diamond_stingray.desc: A beautifully deceptive fish, hiding in the sandy flats of the sea floor during the day, the Black Diamond comes out in the cover of night to hunt, using its black body and white glistening spots to camoflage.
shallowsalts.starry_night.name: Starry Night
shallowsalts.starry_night.desc: A jewel, a thick and translucent outer shell, this fish uses bioluminesence flakes to perfectly emulate the stars above, it looks as if it is made of ruby and gold, with a hard glss like texture this fish is aberration of pure beauty.
